import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import Cube from '../components/Cube'; // Assuming you have a Cube component import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Home.css'; // Import your CSS const Home = () => { useEffect(() => { // Function to animate letters const animateLetters = () => { const letters = document.querySelectorAll('.title-container h1 span'); letters.forEach((letter, index) => { setTimeout(() => { letter.style.transition = 'opacity 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease'; letter.style.opacity = 1; letter.style.transform = 'translateX(0)'; }, 500 * index); }); }; // Call the animation function when the page is loaded animateLetters(); }, []); return (

About Us

Innovative web solutions by combining Front-End proficiency with UX/UI design. Our expertise extends beyond web development to encompass strategic digital marketing services, including SEO for organic growth and inbound marketing strategies.

We also specialize in developing custom web tools to enhance user experience, such as digital clocks, language switchers, and theme customization options (light, original, dark). Additionally, we offer financial control tools and various other solutions tailored to meet your specific needs. Partner with us to elevate your online presence and drive sustainable success.
